caller_intent: Kurt Snyder is following up on a previous message regarding a mistaken payment by National General Insurance, seeking confirmation that the policy cancellation and refund process is underway.
resolution_steps: Brandi confirms that National General has been contacted and the policy is canceled with a refund pending.
Brandi assures Kurt the refund will be processed within 72 hours and advises checking by next Wednesday.
Brandi agrees to monitor the refund status and check on Monday morning.
Brandi apologizes for the inconvenience caused by the error.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy cancellation and refund procedures
summary: Kurt Snyder discusses a mistaken payment by National General Insurance with Brandi, confirming the policy is canceled and a refund is pending. Brandi assures him of monitoring the refund process and provides a follow-up timeline. The conversation concludes with mutual understanding and a plan to check on the refund status by Monday.
